name: LoopDodge
description:
LoopDodge

Dodge your past self in this little arcade game.

Every loop, you collect coins to gain points.
When the loop ends, your past self becomes an obstacle,
copying your exact movements.

Get a new high score and maybe even try the EXTREME mode,
if you are brave enough.



WASD, arrows or left joystick to move.

My other games.
